io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel

Class GroupChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.GroupChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, IGroupChannel, ITextChannel, IVoiceChannel, ICreationTime, ISnowflake

    public class GroupChannel
extends Channel
implements IGroupChannel, IVoiceChannel
    Represents a GroupDMChannel on discord. GroupChannels are only available for user accounts, not bot accounts.
    Author:
    Perry Berman
